company.name: VastSilicon
company.mission: Building cognitive infrastructure for human flourishing
company.philosophy: Complexity isn't the problem—it's potential waiting for translation
company.vision: Technology hub dedicated to creating innovative solutions that solve real-world problems
company.about: Founded by a team of passionate entrepreneurs and developers, we're dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible with modern technology while maintaining a user-first approach

coreValues: We believe in the power of technology to transform lives and businesses
Our mission is to create intuitive, beautiful, and functional applications that solve real problems

moneytide.name: MoneyTide
moneytide.tagline: Manage expenses. Split costs. Stay organized.
moneytide.description: MoneyTide brings clarity to your personal and shared finances with an elegant, intuitive iOS experience
moneytide.footerCTA: Precision tools for your financial well-being

personal.title: Smart Category Tracking
personal.description: Understand your spending habits with automatic categorization and visual breakdowns that help identify saving opportunities

personal.title: Insightful Dashboard
personal.description: Get a complete picture of your finances with spending trends, category breakdowns, and balance summaries—all in one view

personal.title: Receipt Documentation
personal.description: Capture and store receipt images directly within the app for complete expense records and easy reference

personal.title: Seamless Sync
personal.description: Your data syncs effortlessly across all your devices, ensuring your financial information is always current and accessible

shared.title: Group Expenses
shared.description: Create groups for roommates, trips, or events. Split costs fairly and keep everyone on the same page

shared.title: Balance Overview
shared.description: See who owes what at a glance with clear, visual balance summaries for every group and individual

shared.title: Fair Split Calculations
shared.description: Let MoneyTide calculate exactly who owes what based on your group's expenses and splits

shared.title: Privacy-Focused
shared.description: Your financial data stays secure and private with our privacy-first approach and optional encrypted cloud backup

marketingMessages: Designed with elegance and simplicity in mind, following Apple's Human Interface Guidelines
Take control of your finances with our intuitive app designed for everyone
Track expenses with precision, categorize transactions, and gain insights through intuitive visualizations

choicecheck.name: ChoiceCheck
choicecheck.subtitle: ChoiceCheck uses AI to analyze any product and tell you if it matches YOUR health goals, dietary needs, and preferences
choicecheck.description: Make informed decisions about your food and cosmetics by scanning ingredients and receiving instant health insights based on trusted guidelines

howItWorks.title: Snap a Photo
howItWorks.description: Point your camera at any product

howItWorks.title: AI Analyzes
howItWorks.description: Our AI checks ingredients, nutrition, and your preferences

howItWorks.title: Get Your Answer
howItWorks.description: Clear scores (0-100) with ratings and detailed reasoning

features.title: Instant Ingredient Analysis
features.description: Scan any ingredient list and get immediate insights on potential health impacts

features.title: Health Ratings & Alternatives
features.description: Get clear health ratings and suggestions for healthier alternatives

features.title: Personalized Alerts
features.description: Set your dietary preferences and receive personalized warnings for ingredients to avoid

userPersonas.title: Health-Conscious Shoppers
userPersonas.description: Finally know which products actually match your health goals

userPersonas.title: Busy Parents
userPersonas.description: Make confident choices for your family in seconds

userPersonas.title: Fitness Enthusiasts
userPersonas.description: Optimize your nutrition without the guesswork

problemsSolved.problem: Overwhelmed by choices in the grocery store
problemsSolved.solution: Get instant scores and ratings to guide decisions
AI cuts through marketing to show facts

problemsSolved.problem: No time to research every product
Hard to stick to health goals

futureVision.expansion: Beyond food: Your universal choice assistant
futureVision.vision: Today it's food. Tomorrow it's everything you buy

common.responseTime: We'll get back to you within 24 hours on business days
common.supportMessage: Our support team is ready to assist you with any questions or issues

moneytide.helpMessage: How can we help? Browse topics below or contact our support team for personalized assistance

choicecheck.helpMessage: Find answers, get help, and contact our support team
